short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BuildAspect is a new platform for residential designers and builders to manage finish selections & specifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BuildAspect Chrome Extension allows interior designers and builders to quickly add products from around the web to their projects and product library. BuildAspect uses modern AI to scrape relevant product information and images, eliminating tedious manual data entry.
